channel.title: Quo
channel.description:
[size=2em] A chaotic server where death is a guarantee, will you prove us wrong? Ape atoll is a dangerous place. The island is filled to the brim with monsters and enemies who are out to kill you. Couple that fact that most areas are high risk pvp, you're in for an intense time. [/size]
[u][size=3.95em]~Features~[/size][/u] [size=2em]Clipped projectiles, following, combat, and NPCs Smooth combat and switching Many unique minibosses spread through out the world Challenging yet rewarding custom boss fights Server wide random events, such as Void portals spawning or Chaos Elemental attacks Custom Tele tab, set up a teleport any where in the world Unique and useful firemaking, Lighting a fire regenerates you and your nearby allies HP over time Unique Thieving; NPCs spawn and walk on a path before leaving, the better the rewards the rarer it is for the NPC to spawn Proper spacing when fighting large NPCs An information orb which displays useful info such as your veng and freeze timer, as well as your opponents freeze timer and prayer level A Coal pouch that when used with Smithing, automatically uses the coal from the pouch first. A custom Blood and Soul alter for Runecrafting The Barrows Brothers randomly spawn through out the world, making acquiring their armor difficult but satisfying A real Economy. Money isn't generated from simply Thieving a stall over and over. Simple subtleties such as follow dancing, and animations when interacting with objects Unique item effects that spice up combat, with out changing it too much A home Area that acts for a hub for most skilling as well, helping keep things centralized A custom duel arena in the home area High Risk Areas everywhere. PvP World like enviroment [/size]
[size=3.95em]Download [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/ab5nl9wv0cznygz/QuoClient.jar]QuoClient[/url] [/size] If you have any issues with the above link use the one below [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/zrms6y92hc69c59/QuoClient.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/download/zrms6y92hc69c59/QuoClient.zip[/url]Item Effects: Ring of Wealth(i): Automatically pick up stack-able items Torag's Hammers: Operate to immediately do a second attack, 30 second cooldown. Dragon Defender: Operate, your health will not drop below 1 for a few seconds. Mage's Book: Operate, switch between normal and ancient magics, cost a chunk of hp. Green Tribal Mask: Your attack have increased potency, increasing poison weapon damage up to 10. Gold Tribal Mask: Operate, your next attack will be increased by the amount of poison damage on your target. Brown Tribal Mask: Immune to poison
Media: [img]https://i.gyazo.com/7cba24750208b40accf235ee4a4c5c1c.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ec4b7ca9eedd71b1bf501f38db43ebc9.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/a5b950bb39b9c58f5e9552d6de60789c.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/61888eaac11ae21d7545aacc94dff980.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/71bfe0c3adde8318e4f60d461eeec16e.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/ad9012d9b11e41a48c1b5834212b9cc2.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/cf7bad993a45f5fdcf2de29e1528379d.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/e4fa26e2df41f03e41e1835d5ef53ab3.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/34a7ceda9823d9a97e4b7de6f4a1ceaa.gif[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/e5a5f1d4c59f6db3d6f23d90842932a0.gif[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/210c1zm.png[/img] [img]http://i60.tinypic.com/2re46e9.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/34gqzkk.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/34ql743.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/v5ztvp.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/1zflhra.png[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/14mdru8.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/2af7mc.png[/img] [img]http://i61.tinypic.com/2nvgggz.png[/img] [img]http://i57.tinypic.com/a32sdh.png[/img]

item.title: Quo
item.dc:creator: @yeoldhag yeoldhag
item.description:
@yeoldhag wrote:

[size=2em] A chaotic server where death is a guarantee, will you prove us wrong? Ape atoll is a dangerous place. The island is filled to the brim with monsters and enemies who are out to kill you. Couple that fact that most areas are high risk pvp, you’re in for an intense time. [/size]

[size=3.95em]~Features~[/size]
[size=2em]Clipped projectiles, following, combat, and NPCs
Smooth combat and switching
Many unique minibosses spread through out the world
Challenging yet rewarding custom boss fights
Server wide random events, such as Void portals spawning or Chaos Elemental attacks
Custom Tele tab, set up a teleport any where in the world
Unique and useful firemaking, Lighting a fire regenerates you and your nearby allies HP over time
Unique Thieving; NPCs spawn and walk on a path before leaving, the better the rewards the rarer it is for the NPC to spawn
Proper spacing when fighting large NPCs
An information orb which displays useful info such as your veng and freeze timer, as well as your opponents freeze timer and prayer level
A Coal pouch that when used with Smithing, automatically uses the coal from the pouch first.
A custom Blood and Soul alter for Runecrafting
The Barrows Brothers randomly spawn through out the world, making acquiring their armor difficult but satisfying
A real Economy. Money isn’t generated from simply Thieving a stall over and over.
Simple subtleties such as follow dancing, and animations when interacting with objects
Unique item effects that spice up combat, with out changing it too much
A home Area that acts for a hub for most skilling as well, helping keep things centralized
A custom duel arena in the home area
High Risk Areas everywhere.
PvP World like enviroment
[/size]

[size=3.95em]Download
QuoClient
[/size]
If you have any issues with the above link use the one below
http://www.mediafire.com/download/zrms6y92hc69c59/QuoClient.zipItem Effects:
Ring of Wealth(i): Automatically pick up stack-able items
Torag’s Hammers: Operate to immediately do a second attack, 30 second cooldown.
Dragon Defender: Operate, your health will not drop below 1 for a few seconds.
Mage’s Book: Operate, switch between normal and ancient magics, cost a chunk of hp.
Green Tribal Mask: Your attack have increased potency, increasing poison weapon damage up to 10.
Gold Tribal Mask: Operate, your next attack will be increased by the amount of poison damage on your target.
Brown Tribal Mask: Immune to poison
